corrective_action: Conduct at least 8 user interviews before proceeding. Schedule interviews immediately.
Analyze at least 5 competitors. Use the competitive-analysis template for each.
Create a Problem Statement using the problem-statement template. Cannot proceed without one.
Document stakeholder alignment. Recommended but not blocking.
Formulate at least 3 testable hypotheses. Use Assumption Mapping (BT-033) to prioritize.
Create at least 2 persona drafts using the persona template.
Create a validation plan mapping evidence to hypotheses before testing.
